channel.title: Crazyscape 317 [old schoo]
channel.description:

Download link: http://uppit.com/273ka3h694cc/CrazyScape_Client.rar
Download extra cache if you can't run client! Download: http://uppit.com/fsr7i4gvaezj/cache.rar
Hey guys :D
DO NOT ask for staff!
Owner: Jay Co-owner: tyler, Martin
Features: Some customs items [picture coming soon] Statius Vesta Morrigan Zuriel Dragon claws with special attack all Godswords Simple home Simple shops Old school pking Corpotal beast King black dragon Slayer tower God wars Rares Spirit shields Duel arena whit staking [u can challenge everywhere] Ancients Lunars Heal other [heals 8 hitpoints] Stat spy ...And more!
We have 2 forums:
http://crazyscape4u.createboard.net/forum - is our newest forums http://crazyscape4u.smfforfree3.com - is our classic forums
At classic forums are like all time moderator, admin or owner at chat box!
Register to both for Up to date news!
Some screenies [more coming soon]
Home [img]http://i43.tinypic.com/21ep5ac.jpg[/img]
Pest control shop [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/111tf00.jpg[/img]

Duel arena [img]http://i43.tinypic.com/34ht8is.jpg[/img]
Ice barrage [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/ta4paw.jpg[/img]
Join us now!
